meta.title: Thailand Constituency Map - ECT Election Data
meta.description: Interactive map of Thailand's 400 election constituencies from the Election Commission of Thailand (ECT).

header.subtitle: 400 Election Constituencies - Election Commission of Thailand (ECT)

heatmap.title: Split-Ticket Voting Heatmap
heatmap.subtitle: Constituency MP vs Party List Difference
heatmap.stats_intro: To the world and developed nations — on February 8, Thailand held an election, and these are the amusing statistics from our developing country.

graphs.title: Ballot Diff Analysis Graphs
graphs.subtitle: Deep analysis: turnout difference between constituency MP and party list ballots across 400 constituencies
graphs.winner_pie_desc: Count of winning MPs in areas where |diff %| exceeds threshold, grouped by party
graphs.normalized_pie_desc: Ratio of total absolute diff to registered voters by region

diffwinratio.title: Win Ratio vs Split-Ticket Gap
diffwinratio.x_axis: Area Turnout Diff |MP Ballot − Party List Ballot| (count, log)

party_analysis.title: Party Anomaly Analysis
party_analysis.subtitle: Analyze ballot differences between constituency MP and party list, grouped by winning party, with Z-Score anomaly detection
party_analysis.total_diff_desc: Sum of |turnout diff| across constituencies won by each party (number in brackets = seats won)
party_analysis.avg_diff_title: Average Diff per Constituency by Party
party_analysis.avg_diff_desc: Mean turnout diff (MP ballot − party list) per constituency won. Positive = more MP voters, negative = more party list voters
party_analysis.box_desc: Box plot showing median, Q1/Q3, range, and outliers of turnout diff per party (parties with ≥ 3 seats only)
party_analysis.scatter_title: Scatter: Diff Count vs Diff Percent
party_analysis.scatter_desc: Each dot is a constituency colored by winning party. Dots with |Z-Score| > 2 are highlighted as anomalies
party_analysis.anomaly_desc: Constituencies with |Z-Score| greater than 2 compared to nationwide mean and standard deviation, grouped by party
party_analysis.summary_desc: Aggregate statistics per party: seats won, total diff, average diff, standard deviation, anomaly count

ballot_forensics.title: Ballot Forensics
ballot_forensics.subtitle: Deep forensic analysis of invalid votes, blank votes, valid vote ratios, reporting completeness, and referendum cross-reference across all 400 constituencies
ballot_forensics.scatter_title: Invalid Vote Scatter: MP vs Party List
ballot_forensics.scatter_desc: Each dot is a constituency. X = MP invalid vote %, Y = PL invalid vote %. Dots far from the diagonal have suspicious invalid vote discrepancies
ballot_forensics.diff_bar_desc: Top 30 constituencies by absolute difference in invalid/blank vote percentages between MP and party list ballots
ballot_forensics.completeness_desc: Constituencies where vote station counting is not yet 100% complete or has been paused
ballot_forensics.ref_desc: Compare election turnout vs referendum turnout per constituency. Dots far from the diagonal show suspicious turnout discrepancies
ballot_forensics.anomaly_desc: Weighted anomaly score combining invalid diff, blank diff, turnout diff, referendum gap, and reporting completeness
ballot_forensics.table_desc: Full sortable table of all 400 constituencies. Click column headers to sort. Use party filter above to narrow results
